availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Bland. Father of Mary M. Bland, John R. Bland, Samuel Bland Jr., Prudence A. Bland, Henry A. Bland, William Bland, Dulcina Bland. Farmer in Breckinridge County, Kentucky, in 1850. Charged with keeping a tippling house in Breckinridge County in 1859. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 119B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 2, p. 581.
"Samuel Bland (1806-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial 253678065, accessed September 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/253678065.
